[
    FullOpeningTag(
        Span(
            1,
            1,
        ),
    ),
    Function(
        Function {
            comments: CommentGroup {
                comments: [],
            },
            attributes: [],
            function: Span(
                3,
                1,
            ),
            ampersand: None,
            name: SimpleIdentifier {
                span: Span(
                    3,
                    10,
                ),
                value: "foo",
            },
            parameters: FunctionParameterList {
                comments: CommentGroup {
                    comments: [],
                },
                left_parenthesis: Span(
                    3,
                    13,
                ),
                members: [],
                right_parenthesis: Span(
                    3,
                    24,
                ),
            },
            return_type: None,
            body: FunctionBody {
                comments: CommentGroup {
                    comments: [
                        Comment {
                            span: Span(
                                3,
                                14,
                            ),
                            format: MultiLine,
                            content: "/* $bar */",
                        },
                    ],
                },
                left_brace: Span(
                    3,
                    26,
                ),
                statements: [],
                right_brace: Span(
                    3,
                    27,
                ),
            },
        },
    ),
]
